definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

sentences.english: The landlord put a new stove in my room.
sentences.chinese: 房东在我房间里放了一个新暖炉。

sentences.english: The landlord aunt is always telling me much information about the Xinkai River.
sentences.chinese: 房东大娘总是会跟我讲关于新开河的见闻。

sentences.english: Suddenly the kitchen door opened, and his landlady came out into the hall. "Well, well. ""
sentences.chinese: 突然厨房门打开，他的房东太太走到厅子里来。

sentences.english: In his article, he wrote that my host had taken the cash.
sentences.chinese: 他的文章里写到，我的房东收下了这些钱。

sentences.english: 6 and the landlord with new tenant at the house.
sentences.chinese: 房东陪着新房客在看屋子。

sentences.english: My landlord’s daughter and I would create a unique nativity of our own.
sentences.chinese: 房东的女儿和我共同度过了一个特别的圣诞节。

sentences.english: If rent longer than 12 month, the rent is on request.
sentences.chinese: 如果租期需超过12个月，需与房东商量，另议。

sentences.english: A landlord and a new tenant are talking about rules of the building.
sentences.chinese: 一个房东和一个新房客正在讨论租赁房屋的条例。

sentences.english: The landlady found they had been illegally subletting the flat.
sentences.chinese: 女房东发现他们一直在违法转租公寓。

sentences.english: We ate downstairs in Mr. and Mrs. Kim’s apartment. They were our landlords.
sentences.chinese: 我们在楼下金先生金太太的房间吃饭，他们是房东。

sentences.english: After lodger and landlord meet, fu Qi of the rest chummage.
sentences.chinese: 房客与房东见面之后，将剩余的房租付齐。

sentences.english: Why Should Landlords Require Tenants to Have Renter's Insurance?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要房东要求租户有承租人的保险？。

sentences.english: "He's been in his room all day, " the landlady said downstairs.
sentences.chinese: “他已经在屋里呆了一整天，”女房东在楼下说。

sentences.english: The old lady was flung out of the house because the owner wanted to pull it down.
sentences.chinese: 老太太被赶出了房子，因为房东要推倒房子。

sentences.english: I moved becasue I can't put up with that officious landlady any longer.
sentences.chinese: 我搬家是因为我再也受不了那个好管闲事的女房东了。

sentences.english: The old lady was thrown out of the house because the owner wanted to pull it down.
sentences.chinese: 因房东要拆屋，这位老太太被赶出这栋房子。

definition: rent for a room or house
property/real estate/abbr. for 物業管理|物业管理[wu4 ye4 guan3 li3], property management
to rent jointly with other people/co-renting
